title: Submit Pipeline Nomination
description: A scheduler submits a nomination to transport a batch of gasoline on a third-party pipeline for the next cycle.

tasks.description: Check available capacity on the Colonial Pipeline for the next 5-day cycle.
tasks.expected_outcome: The available capacity is retrieved from the carrier's system.

tasks.description: Create a new nomination request for 50,000 barrels of gasoline from Houston to Atlanta.
tasks.expected_outcome: A nomination request is drafted with the correct product, volume, and path.

tasks.description: Submit the nomination to the pipeline carrier's electronic system for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: The nomination is successfully submitted and a confirmation number is received.
